author: civanch
body:
Cleanup of main Sensitive detectors classes for calorimeters:
1) removed variables shadowing
2) reduce number of repeated computations
3) reduced computations when energy deposition zero
4) use of const pointers to G4 objects in private methods
5) after code checker applied extra files and modifications were added

Estimated speed-up of the SIM step ~1%, results should be identical.
title: Geant4 sensitive detectors cleanup 2
